explanation: The selected lineup is drawn from Pakhtakor's landmark 2019 Uzbekistan Super League match—a game widely regarded as one of the club’s most significant performances. In this decisive fixture, Pakhtakor not only clinched the league title but also showcased a perfect balance of tactical discipline and attacking flair in a 4-2-3-1 formation. Each player in this lineup was an integral part of that historic victory, with famed talents like Server Djeparov orchestrating the attack and Maksim Shatskikh providing pace and creativity on the wing. This match marked the peak of club performances with all selected players having shared the pitch in an official contest, thus earning this lineup a special place in the club’s storied history.
